isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - TURBOCHARGER, REPLACE (1998 V8 ENGINE)

wtsproc.config: New turbocharger design with 1998 model year T 444E (beginning with engine serial #666543)

step1.para: Disconnect IAT sensor. Remove complete air filter assembly, to include air inlet pipe / hoses.
Remove both charge air cooler pipes / hoses.
Disconnect map sensor. Remove air intake y-pipe.
Disconnect both exhaust inlet and outlet pipes from turbocharger. Remove both clamps for ease of removal / installation.
Remove 2 bolts retaining turbocharger to pedestal.

note.para: The turbocharger is aligned with guide dowels on the pedestal and on the exhaust inlet adapter. To remove turbocharger, apply light pressure on the turbocharger towards the rear of the vehicle. Dislodge turbocharger from pedestal guide dowel first.

step1.para: Replace turbocharger O-ring seals. Lubricate new seals with clean engine oil.

note.para: Align turbocharger with guide dowel on the exhaust inlet adapter first. Lower turbocharger on pedestal guide dowel.

step1.para: Connect exhaust inlet and outlet pipes to turbocharger.
Install air intake y-pipe with new gasket lubricated with clean engine oil. Connect map sensor.
Install both charge air cooler pipes / hoses.
Install complete air filter assembly, to include air inlet pipe / hoses.

note.para: Clean air filter housing of any debris prior to installation.

step1.para: Start engine. Check engine operation. Check for fluid leaks.
